languages.text: "Лексмеханик говорил про какие-то отводы шлака и символы Хаоса на машинах... что творят прихвостни Архиврага с обитателями нижних уровней?"
"The Lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"
languages.original_text: "Лексмеханик говорил про какие-то отводы шлака и символы Хаоса на машинах... что творят прихвостни Архиврага с обитателями нижних уровней?"

traits.locale_text: "The lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"
"The lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"
"The lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"
"The Lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"

languages.text: “那个思律机僧之前提到了处理矿渣废物的系统，还有机器上的混沌印记……混沌大敌的爪牙们对这些底层居民做了什么事情？”
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: “那个法律技工之前提到了处理矿渣废物的系统，还有机器上的混沌印记……混沌大敌的爪牙们对这些底层居民做了什么事情？”

languages.text: «El lexmecánico dijo algo sobre la eliminación de desechos metálicos y símbolos del Caos en las máquinas... ¿Qué están haciendo los esbirros del Archienemigo con la gente de los niveles inferiores?».
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: «El lexmecánico dijo algo sobre la eliminación de desechos metálicos y símbolos del Caos en las máquinas... ¿Qué están haciendo los esbirros del Archienemigo con la gente de los niveles inferiores?».

languages.text: 「法技術者は、溶融廃棄物と機械に書かれた渾沌のシンボルについて話していた…渾沌の勢力の配下は、下層の人民に何をしているのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: 「法技術者は、溶融廃棄物と機械に書かれた渾沌のシンボルについて話していた…渾沌の勢力の配下は、下層の人民に何をしているのだろうか？」

languages.text: "Der Lexmechanicus sprach von irgendeiner Schlacke-Entsorgung und Chaos-Symbolen auf Maschinen ... Was machen die Lakaien des Erzfeinds mit den Menschen in den unteren Ebenen?"
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Lexmechanicus sprach von irgendeiner Schlacke-Entsorgung und Chaos-Symbolen auf Maschinen ... Was machen die Lakaien des Erzfeinds mit den Menschen in den unteren Ebenen?"

languages.text: « Le lexmécanicien a parlé d'un système d'élimination des déchets et de symboles du Chaos sur les machines... Que font subir les sbires du Grand Ennemi aux résidents des niveaux inférieurs ? »
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: « Le lexmécanicien a parlé d'un système d'élimination des déchets et de symboles du Chaos sur les machines... Que font subir les sbires du Grand Ennemi aux résidents des niveaux inférieurs ? »

languages.text: "Lexmekanik, bir tür cüruf ifna tesisinden ve makinelerin üzerindeki Kaos sembollerinden bahsetmişti... Şerbaşı'nın kulları, alt seviyelerde yaşayanlara ne yapıyor?"
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanic talked about some kind of slag waste disposal and Chaos symbols on machines... What are the Archenemy's minions doing to the people of the lower levels?"

traits.locale_text: “Lexmekanik, bir tür cüruf ifna tesisinden ve makinelerin üzerindeki Kaos sembollerinden bahsetmişti... Şerbaşı’nın kulları, alt seviyelerde yaşayanlara ne yapıyor?”
